skill.name: clinpgx-database
skill.description: Access ClinPGx pharmacogenomics data (successor to PharmGKB). Query gene-drug interactions, CPIC guidelines, allele functions, for precision medicine and genotype-guided dosing decisions.
skill.summary: Access ClinPGx pharmacogenomics data (successor to PharmGKB). Query gene-drug interactions, CPIC gui...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: The skill includes a Python script that makes HTTPS requests to the ClinPGx API for pharmacogenomics data. It includes rate limiting, error handling, and optional caching to local files. All capabilities align with the stated research purpose.

content.value_statement: Finding pharmacogenomic evidence across genes and drugs is slow and fragmented. This skill queries ClinPGx endpoints and summarizes results for research and decision support.
actual_capabilities: Fetch gene details by symbol from the ClinPGx API
Search drugs and chemicals by name
Retrieve gene drug pairs and CPIC guidelines
Query alleles, variants, clinical annotations, and drug labels
Get pathway information by ID or drug name
Cache API responses and export CSV with pandas
limitations: Subject to external API availability and rate limits
CSV export requires pandas to be installed
Results are informational and not clinical advice

use_cases.title: Check CPIC guidance
use_cases.description: Retrieve gene drug pairs and guideline summaries for a medication review.

use_cases.title: Analyze allele functions
use_cases.description: Pull allele function and frequency data for a pharmacogene panel.

use_cases.title: Build PGx datasets
use_cases.description: Batch query genes and export results for downstream analysis.

prompt_templates.title: Get a gene profile
prompt_templates.scenario: You need details for one gene.
prompt_templates.prompt: Fetch ClinPGx information for gene CYP2D6 and summarize key functions and related drugs.

prompt_templates.title: Find gene drug pairs
prompt_templates.prompt: List gene drug pairs for CYP2C19 and highlight any CPIC level A results.

prompt_templates.title: Check guideline info
prompt_templates.prompt: Retrieve CPIC guidelines for gene CYP2C19 and drug clopidogrel, then summarize the recommendation level.

prompt_templates.title: Batch panel analysis
prompt_templates.scenario: You have a multi gene panel.
prompt_templates.prompt: Batch query CYP2D6, CYP2C19, and TPMT, then export the results to a CSV file.

output_examples.input: Summarize ClinPGx data for CYP2C19 and clopidogrel.
output: Gene CYP2C19 details with clinical annotations
CPIC guideline entries and recommendation level
Evidence sources summarized for the interaction

best_practices: Respect the two requests per second rate limit
Cache frequent queries to reduce API calls
Review evidence levels before using results
anti_patterns: Using results as direct clinical decisions without review
Running large bulk queries without rate limiting
Storing patient identifiers in cache files

faq.question: Which platforms are supported?
faq.answer: It works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code workflows.

faq.question: What are the main limits?
faq.answer: The API enforces a two requests per second limit and may return 429 errors.

faq.question: Can I integrate results into my pipeline?
faq.answer: Yes, the script returns JSON and can export CSV for data pipelines.

faq.question: How is data safety handled?
faq.answer: No personal data handling is built in, so avoid storing identifiers.

faq.question: What if the API returns errors?
faq.answer: Use the retry logic and check for 404 or 429 responses.

faq.question: How does it compare to PharmGKB?
faq.answer: ClinPGx is the successor and consolidates PharmGKB with updated endpoints.
